headline: Cigna Approves Coverage for Cleerly's AI Cardiovascular Imaging Technology
summary: DENVER, September 24, 2025--Cleerly, a leader in AI-based cardiovascular imaging, today announced that Cigna will begin covering Cleerly LABS Advanced Plaque Analysis effective October 1, 2025. The coverage decision makes Cigna the latest major insurer to recognize the clinical and economic value of Artificial Intelligence Enabled CT Based Quantitative Coronary Tomography (AI-QCT)/Coronary Plaque Analysis (AI-CPA) technology for cardiovascular care.

thumbnail.caption: Major Insurer Joins UnitedHealthcare in Covering Cleerly's AI-QCT/AI-CPA Technology, Expanding Access to 61 Million Americans
